Imagery Description: (a) Dionysos bending forward towards bust of crowned goddess (Aphrodite ?) rising from the ground, beneath a laurel tree in added colour, (b) satyr with 'skewer of fruit' and red fillet in r. hand, dotted fawnNon Sepcifiedskin over 1. arm and redNon Sepcifiedfilleted thyrsus in 1. hand, moving to r. and looking back to 1.
